title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automate any business process using Amazon Quick Suite (BIZ224)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Quick Suite 自动化任何业务流程 (BIZ224)
abstract: Discover how to automate any business process using Amazon Quick Flows and Amazon Quick Automate, empowering every user in your organization to safely leverage agentic AI. Learn from real-world success stories as companies like 3M, Kitsa, dLocal, and Propulse Labs use Amazon Quick Suite to save time and money while improving customer outcomes. Hear directly from Jabil as they share their automation success story leveraging Amazon Quick Suite's automation capabilities, key insights, and vision for scaling automation enterprise-wide. Walk away with practical insights for implementing agentic automations to transform how you and your teams work.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon Quick Flows 和 Amazon Quick Automate 自动化任何业务流程，使组织中的每位用户都能安全地利用智能体 AI。从 3M、Kitsa、dLocal 和 Propulse Labs 等公司的真实成功案例中学习，了解他们如何使用 Amazon Quick Suite 节省时间和成本，同时改善客户成果。直接聆听 Jabil 分享他们利用 Amazon Quick Suite 自动化能力实现的自动化成功故事、关键洞察以及在企业范围内扩展自动化的愿景。获取实施智能体自动化的实用见解，以转变您和团队的工作方式。
